channel.title: Adding an object?
channel.description: can someone tell me where i can change the coords of an object like lets say my server is varrock based and i wanna move dummies and stuff somewhere else...and how can i do that with like a portal or something?

item.title: Adding an object?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok, the global objects are there and u cant MOVE them, but u can delete and put new ones , now in client java serch

public void AddGlobalObj

then under

[code]public void AddGlobalObj(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID,

int Face, int ObjectType) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
{
if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60)
{
person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face,

ObjectType);
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

add

public void NewObjects() {}

inbetween the { and } add this format

AddGlobalObj(X COARD, Y COARD, OBJECT ID, DIRECTION, TYPE);

if u wanna delete an object use the object id 6591 on the coards of the object u wanna delete

Read full topic
